# Set up microservice
RUN wget -q -O nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0.zip https://nexus.open-o.org/content/repositories/autorelease-1084/org/openo/nfvo/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment/1.0.0/juju-vnfmadapterservice-deployment-1.0.0.zip && unzip -q -o -B nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0.zip && rm -f nfvo-driver-vnfm-juju-1.0.0.zip
EXPOSE 8483
RUN echo Open-O 1.0.0 autorelease-1084 > OPENO_VERSION
